item.description:
Your Purpose in Life

It's important to know what your various purposes in life are (work or personal), what qualities you are developing in life, what is really really important to you. We all need a guiding focus and light. We'll do exercises to clarify what your purpose is, what qualities are the real "you", and how to be your authentic self. Vegetarian potluck option 6:30-7:30pm, workshop 7:30-9pm Socialize afterward til as late as 11pm and of course ask Herb anything you want about this topic or others.

Potluck 6:30-7:30pm

7:30 pm - 9:00 pm presentation

Social after 9pm

($30 - Sliding scale to $15)

Herb Pearce is a therapist and communication and personal life coach for individuals, couples, and families. He has taught workshops on all areas of human dynamics for over 30 years.

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Your Purpose in Life
